overview.title: Overview
overview.subtitle: Discover what makes TaskFuchs special
overview.description: TaskFuchs is a comprehensive task management system with an integrated timer, smart parsing, kanban boards, and much more.

tasks.title: Task Management
tasks.description: Create, organize, and track tasks with priorities, due dates, and custom tags.

notes.title: Notes & Templates
notes.description: Write rich markdown notes with daily templates and auto-formatting.

kanban.title: Kanban Boards
kanban.description: Visualize your work with customizable kanban boards and project management.

timer.title: Integrated Timer
timer.description: Built-in Pomodoro timer with sound effects and white noise.

pins.title: Quick Access Pins
pins.description: Pin your most important tasks for easy access at a glance.

emails.title: Email Integration
emails.description: Import emails directly as tasks and stay organized.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Master the art of task management in TaskFuchs with these comprehensive guides.

create_task.title: Creating Tasks
create_task.option1: Click the + button to create a new task
create_task.option2: Use Smart Input for quick task creation

edit_task.title: Editing Tasks
edit_task.option1: Click on any task to open the editor
edit_task.option2: Change priority, date, tags, and description

organize_tasks.title: Organizing Tasks
organize_tasks.option2: Filter tasks by tags or priority

smart_input.title: Smart Parsing
smart_input.description: Quickly create feature-rich tasks using simple text patterns.

example.title: Example
example.result: Creates a task with priority 2, tag 'shopping', and tomorrow's date

priorities.title: Priorities
priorities.english_tip: You can use symbols instead of German equivalents

tags.title: Tags
tags.note: Tags help organize and filter tasks

time.title: Time Estimates
time.english_tip: Use 'm' for minutes and 'h' for hours

dates.title: Dates
dates.calendar_assignment: These assign to the date column

complex_example.title: Complex Example
complex_example.result: High-priority task with multiple tags, scheduled for Friday

pins.pins_description: Keep important tasks visible at all times.

pinning_tasks.option2: Use the pin icon on hover

manage_columns.option2: View all pins in Pins section

statistics.title: Analytics Dashboard
statistics.subtitle: Insights into your productivity and performance

insights.time_tracking_missing_desc: You have planned tasks but no time tracked. Start timers for better insights!
insights.spontaneous_productivity_desc: You work without time planning. Try estimates for better organization!
insights.exceptional_efficiency_desc: You work {percent}% more efficiently than planned. Fantastic performance!
insights.above_expectations_desc: {percent}% efficiency - you regularly exceed your plans.
insights.optimization_potential_desc: At {percent}% efficiency there's room for improvement. Check your estimates.
insights.laser_focus_desc: Focus score of {score}/100. You keep your goals perfectly in sight.
insights.strengthen_focus_desc: Focus score: {score}/100. Try working on fewer tasks simultaneously.
insights.productivity_champion_desc: {count} tasks per hour - you're on fire! üî•
insights.time_management_master_desc: You save an average of {minutes} minutes per session!
insights.adjust_time_estimates_desc: You need {minutes} minutes more than planned. Calculate more generously.
insights.early_bird_advantage_desc: Your best time is {hour}:00. The early bird catches the worm!
insights.night_owl_desc: You're most productive at {hour}:00. A true night worker!
insights.upward_trend_desc: Your efficiency has increased by {percent}%. Keep it up!
insights.perfect_completion_desc: You completed all planned tasks. Phenomenal!
insights.refocus_needed_desc: {percent}% completion rate. Plan less, complete more.
insights.consistency_champion_desc: {days} days in a row productive! You're building strong habits.
insights.good_rhythm_desc: {days} productive days. You're on the right track!
insights.overload_risk_desc: {tasksPerDay} tasks daily with {avgTime}min per task. Watch your work-life balance!
insights.more_momentum_possible_desc: Only {tasksPerDay} tasks daily. You can achieve more!
insights.deep_work_specialist_desc: {longTasks} deep work sessions vs. {shortTasks} quick tasks. Excellent for complex tasks!
insights.task_sprinter_desc: {shortTasks} quick tasks completed. Perfect for administrative work!
insights.deadline_hero_desc: No overdue tasks! You meet all deadlines.
insights.deadline_alarm_desc: {count} overdue tasks. Time for a priority check!
insights.weekday_power_desc: {count} tasks on {weekday} - plan important tasks for this day!
insights.morning_power_desc: {morning} vs. {evening} tasks. You use morning hours optimally!
insights.evening_productivity_desc: {evening} vs. {morning} tasks. You bloom in the evenings!
insights.procrastination_alert_desc: {count} tasks open for over a week. Time to act!
insights.personal_record_desc: {count} tasks in one day - that's your personal best!
insights.focus_master_desc: {percent}% of your tasks were deep work sessions. Impressive!
insights.work_life_balance_check_desc: {hours}h daily on average. Think about breaks and recovery!
insights.momentum_built_desc: {recent} tasks in 3 days vs. {older} before. You're improving!
insights.estimation_genius_desc: {percent}% precise time estimates. You know your work rhythm perfectly!
insights.calibrate_estimates_desc: Only {percent}% precise estimates. Track more for better feel!
insights.sprint_specialist_desc: {count} sprint sessions (15-45min). You love quick wins!
insights.marathon_thinker_desc: {count} marathon sessions (2h+). You master complex challenges!
insights.to_new_successes_desc: Collect more data to get personalized insights.

empty_states.no_archived_tasks_desc: Completed tasks are archived here. You can restore them or delete them permanently at any time.
empty_states.no_archived_notes_desc: Archived notes are displayed here. You can restore them or delete them permanently at any time.

delete_modal.confirm_delete_notes: Do you really want to permanently delete {count} selected note{plural}?

pins.pins_description: With Pins you can collect important tasks from all areas and organize them in custom columns. Perfect for quick access to what matters most.

series.title: Manage Series
series.create_series_instruction: To create a new series, go to the planner and create a new task. There you can configure the series under "Recurring Task".

series.delete_series_warning: All generated instances of this series will also be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
series.no_recurring_tasks_description: Your recurring task series will be displayed here.
series.create_recurring_tasks_instruction: Create recurring tasks in the planner to manage them here.

edit_modal.description: You are editing a recurring task:
edit_modal.question: Do you want to edit only this instance or the entire series?
edit_modal.edit_instance_description: Changes apply only to this one task
edit_modal.edit_entire_series_description: Changes apply to all future instances

backup_modal.title: Set up backup
backup_modal.description: To prevent data loss, TaskFuchs creates automatic JSON backups. Please choose a directory for backups.
backup_modal.hint: You can change interval and target anytime in Settings ‚Üí Data ‚Üí Backup.
backup_modal.tip_text: Place the folder in your cloud (Nextcloud/Dropbox/OneDrive) for extra safety.

-

settings_notes.markdownTip: Tip: Use Markdown syntax for formatting (e.g. # for headings, - for lists)

settings_sidebar.description: Customize menu and set which items appear behind "... More"
settings_sidebar.cannotHideThisItem: This menu item cannot be hidden
settings_sidebar.hintText: The items "Inbox" and "Planner" cannot be hidden as they are required for the basic functionality of the app.

settings_notifications.remindersInBackground: Receive reminders even when the app is running in the background
settings_notifications.receiveTaskReminders: You will receive reminders for your tasks

settings_timer.title: Time Tracking & Pomodoro
settings_timer.description: Set the timer display, configure Pomodoro intervals, and connect optional time integrations.
settings_timer.chooseTimerDisplay: Choose how the timer should be displayed
settings_timer.topBarDesc: Shows the timer in a fixed bar at the top of the screen
settings_timer.floatingWidgetDesc: Movable timer widget with minimal display
settings_timer.pomodoroDesc: Enables structured work and break times
settings_timer.focusModeDesc: Enables the use of Focus Mode for concentrated work

settings_data.regularBackupDesc: Regular local JSON backup to a selected directory.
settings_data.browserNoSupport: Your browser does not support directory selection.
settings_data.restoreDesc: Default: last backup in the selected folder. Without a folder, a file selection dialog appears.
settings_data.confirmResetBackup: Reset all backup settings? Optionally, you can also remove TaskFuchs backup files from the selected folder in the next step.
settings_data.confirmDeleteBackupFiles: Delete TaskFuchs backup files (TaskFuchs_*.json) in the selected folder?
settings_data.resetDesc: This disables automatic backups, removes the selected folder from TaskFuchs, and (optionally) deletes TaskFuchs_*.json in the folder.

settings_information.dataStoredLocally: All data is stored only in your browser (localStorage)
settings_information.noDataTransfer: No data transfer to external servers (except chosen sync options)
settings_information.completeControl: Complete control over your tasks and notes

landing_page.tagline: Your smart helper for focused work.
